rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with reception area incorporating Scandinavian minimalist design elements.
Large living room designed with open space for gatherings, featuring large windows and minimalistic furniture.
Adjacent dining area with ample seating and natural light through floor-to-ceiling glass panels.
Modern kitchen featuring stainless steel fixtures and energy-efficient appliances with integrated storage.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom emphasizing privacy and comfort, designed following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Second bedroom with ample storage and natural lighting, designed in a Scandinavian style.
Third bedroom optimized for flexible use, with Vastu-aligned design elements to promote well-being.
Fourth bedroom designed with Scandinavian aesthetic and Vastu-aligned decor for balanced energy.
Primary bathroom adjacent to master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, incorporating Scandinavian style fixtures.
Secondary bathroom for common use with simple design and modern amenities.

openings.description: Main entrance door with Scandinavian design aesthetics and secure locking mechanism.
Large windows to maximize natural light, complemented by sliding doors connecting to the garden.
Window offering a view of the central courtyard and garden, enhancing indoor-outdoor connectivity.

additional_spaces.description: Open central courtyard designed as a focal point for natural light and ventilation, incorporating local landscaping and Vastu principles.
Expansive garden area around the townhouse with native plants and Scandinavian-inspired landscape design.
Spacious library integrated into the living space, featuring built-in shelves and comfortable seating, designed in a minimalist Scandinavian style.
